channel.title: DataLoggers on Nikhil Kakade
channel.description: Recent content in DataLoggers on Nikhil Kakade

item.title: 20 Channel Voltage Data Logger
item.description: Datalogger measures the voltage of 20 Lead Acid batteries and logs data into the Windows software

item.title: 10 Channel Voltage and Current IoT Data Logger
item.description: GSM based IoT 10 channel voltage and current datalogger

item.title: Single Channel Voltage and Current Data Logger
item.description: Datalogger measures the voltage and charging/discharging current of a Lead Acid battery and store the log data into the memory card.

item.title: 20 Channel voltage Datalogger (Single Card)
item.description: Datalogger measures the voltage of 20 Lead Acid batteries and logs data into the Windows software
